It must be noted that the growing availability of online content as an alternative video platform , along with an expanding market for connected devices , poses a competitive challenge to the entire pay - TV industry in the U.S. The cable companies in particular have been losing video subscribers for quite some time now .

It must be noted that broadband still remains an important growth engine for operators in the U.S. Currently , broadband penetration in the U.S. is close to 75 % and broadband is expected to reach more than 90 % U.S. households in the long run .
